name: Pair
description: A full-stack serverless relationship enrichment web app using AWS Amplify, Cognito, GraphQL, and S3.
roles: Project Management, UI/UX, Prototyping, Full-stack, Serverless
about: Pair is an innovative relationship enrichment app designed to help couples strengthen their bond. With its user-friendly interface and powerful features, Pair allows couples to communicate, set goals, and engage in activities that promote a healthy and fulfilling relationship. Whether you're a newlywed or have been together for years, Pair is the perfect companion to enhance your connection and foster a deeper understanding between you and your partner.

name: Portfolio Website
description: A responsive personal portfolio website showcasing my projects, skills, and experience.
about: My personal portfolio website serves as a comprehensive showcase of my work, skills, and experience as a web developer. It features a responsive design that seamlessly adapts to various screen sizes, ensuring a consistent and engaging user experience across devices. Built using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript—the core web technologies—the website offers an informative and captivating user journey. In line with my commitment to accessibility, I have implemented dark mode functionality, allowing users to effortlessly switch between light and dark color schemes according to their preference. By harnessing the power of AWS Amplify and AWS services, the website benefits from cloud development practices, ensuring efficient deployment and scalability. This website combines responsive development techniques with inclusive design practices following WCAG guidelines.

name: Morning Donuts
description: A website design and development project for a small business.
roles: Cloud Development, Domain Management, Hosting, Serverless
about: A client-based website design and development project aimed at helping a local business establish their online presence. With a focus on user-friendly interfaces, visually appealing designs, and seamless functionality, Morning Donuts creates custom websites tailored to the unique needs and goals of each business. Whether you're a local bakery, coffee shop, or any other small business, Morning Donuts will work closely with you to bring your brand to life on the digital landscape.

name: IdeaXcel
description: IdeaXcel is an innovative e-learning platform that provides a wide range of courses and educational resources. It offers interactive lessons, quizzes, and progress tracking features to enhance the learning experience.
about: IdeaXcel aims to revolutionize online education by providing high-quality and engaging learning content. It caters to learners of all levels and offers courses in various subjects, including technology, business, arts, and more.
